title: Damage Calculator
description: Configure global buffs, pet lineup, and calculate the final damage here.
configPlaceholder: Please paste or generate your configuration code here.

alerts.updatePetSuccess: Updated information for pet at position {{index}}.
alerts.importError: Import failed, the code is invalid or corrupted!
alerts.importErrorParseFailed: Import failed: Unable to parse JSON file.
alerts.calculationWarning: Panel Attack and Skill Power cannot be empty!

copilot.storeDescription: The complete state of the damage calculator, including configuration name, global parameters, and lineup queue.
copilot.updateParamsAction: Update global calculation parameters. One or more parameters can be updated at a time.
copilot.setConfigNameAction: Set the name for the current calculation configuration.
copilot.removePetAction: Remove a pet from the lineup by its position (index).
copilot.removePetParam: The position of the pet to remove in the lineup, starting from 1
copilot.addPetAction: Add a new pet to the lineup queue by its name.
copilot.addPetParam: The exact name of the pet to add
copilot.updatePetAction: Update the configuration of a specified pet in the lineup, e.g., skill ID.
copilot.updatePetIndexParam: The position of the pet to update in the lineup, starting from 1
